snippet: Two Sudanese nationals were also expected to be repatriated, leaving the detainee population at 158.
abstract: Pentagon says two Saudi men held by United States without trial for nearly 12 years at military prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, have been repatriated; two Sudanese nationals are also expected to be repatriated, leaving the detainee population at 158.
lead_paragraph: Two Sudanese nationals were also expected to be repatriated, leaving the detainee population at 158.

headline.main: Two Saudi Prisoners Sent Home From Guantánamo
headline.print_headline: Two Saudi Prisoners Sent Home From Guantánamo
